name: mindfully
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
If you do something mindfully, you do it in a way that is intentionally aware of your body, mind, and feelings in the present moment, in order to create a feeling of calm and to discover the happiness already inside you: Changing habits is not a new idea, but doing it mindfully is new. We should watch our every thought very carefully and act mindfully.
More examplesFewer examplesEating mindfully allows you to appreciate your food and its connection to the rest of the world.As you breathe mindfully in and out, say these words to yourself.We had to do a daily activity mindfully, like brushing your teeth or having a shower.
